data.text: @tonkerthomas Probably the easiest way of telling him to sod off.
@tonkerthomas Haha. It just proves that everyone is conspiring against him!

@tonkerthomas Last I knew, he somehow forced his way into his daughter’s school, no mask, to demand a meeting with the principal to air his grievances about masks and lockdowns, as if the principal had anything to do with it.
@tonkerthomas spoke, and he surprisingly didn’t know (his wife didn’t tell him?!?) and he just barrelled past it spouting more nonsense. Last time I talked to him.

@tonkerthomas Reminds me of when I called an acquaintance, whose wife works with mine, who began spouting COVID nonsense and conspiracies at me. “99% of people survive anyway,” blah blah blah. I tried to interject, informing him that my dad had only died of COVID a couple of months before we
@KurtisJEvans I literally couldn't get a word in edgeways. Short of simply hanging up, an hour was the best I could do.
@tonkerthomas I’m just at a loss to understand how you withstood an hour of it.
@tonkerthomas nothing against bald dudes. current beau is bald.
